channel.title: Optimiziation on Küse's Codes
channel.description: Recent content in Optimiziation on Küse's Codes

item.title: Mixed integer linear optimiziation for supply chain and production
item.description: This blog contains formulas which can be used to optimize the supply chain with multiple suppliers, and a general production planning formula, taken from the book POCHET, Yves und WOLSEY, Laurence A.: Production planning by mixed integer programming.
